sentence.Network_en: She seemed unperturbed by the news.
sentence.Network_cn: 她听到这消息似乎并不惊慌。

sentence.Network_en: We will call the system with Hamitonian? 0 the unperturbed system.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们把具有哈密顿算符? 0的体系叫做未微扰体系.

sentence.Network_en: I had found Adlai unperturbed in the midst of pandemonium.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得艾德莱在一片大混乱中仍然镇定自若.
